Paragraph: The patient experienced relapsing MSSA bacteremia on day 9 , increasing the suspicion for a central nervous system ( CNS ) infection .

2. Bacteremia - a condition where bacteria are present in the blood.
3. CNS (Central Nervous System) infection - a type of infection that affects the brain and spinal cord.
